original_text: In the first place, I hear that when you come together as a church, there are divisions among you, and to some extent I believe it.
korean_text: 먼저 너희가 교회에 모일 때에 너희 중에 분쟁이 있다 함을 듣고 어느 정도 믿거니와

sentences.original_text: In the first place, I hear
that when you come together as a church
and to some extent I believe it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어느 정도 나는 그것을 믿는다
